attributes.action: allow the geographical area known as 'the Wirral' to become its own county
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow the geographical area known as 'the Wirral' to become its own county."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12852.asp

Prime Minister's Office
